channel.title: Juab County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Juab County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-6 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-6 west. Distance to Lynndyl and Delta.

item.title: US-6 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-6 west. Distance to Delta - 49 miles.

item.title: US-6 West at UT-36
item.description: US-6 West at UT-36 north to Tooele.

item.title: US-6 West Approaching UT-36
item.description: US-6 West approaching UT-36 to Tooele. Continue west on US-6 for Delta.

item.title: US-6 West - Entering Eureka / Juab County
item.description: US-6 West - Entering Eureka and Juab County.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 233
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 233 - UT-54 West/Mona.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 222
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 222 - BL-15/UT-28/S. Main St.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 207 Offramp at UT-78
item.description: I-15 north on Exit 207 offramp - UT-78 jct. Turn left for Mills; turn right for UT-78 to Levan.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 207
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 207 - UT-78 East/Mills.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 202
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 202 - Yuba State Park.

item.title: UT-28 North at I-15
item.description: UT-28 north at I-15 junction in Nephi.

item.title: UT-28 North Approaching I-15
item.description: UT-28 north approaching I-15. Turn right on I-15 north for Salt Lake City. Continue north on UT-28 for City Center (Nephi) and Hospital.

item.title: UT-28 North at UT-78
item.description: UT-28 north at UT-78 in Levan.

item.title: UT-28 North Approaching UT-78
item.description: UT-28 north approaching UT-78. Use UT-28 north for Salt Lake City (via I-15 North). Use UT-78 west for Cedar City (via I-15 South).

item.title: UT-28 North Approaching UT-78
item.description: UT-28 north approaching UT-78. Turn right for UT-28 north to I-15 North. Turn left for UT-78 west to I-15 South.

item.title: UT-28 North Approaching UT-78
item.description: UT-28 north approaching UT-78 in Levan.

item.title: UT-28 North - Juab County
item.description: Entering Juab County on UT-28 north. This county line sign is non typical in that it is not written in all capitol letters.

item.title: I-15 South - Speed Limit 80
item.description: Speed Limit 80 on I-15 south. Utah raised speed limits on sections of I-15 in 2008, and in 2012 decided to make these test sections permanent. Texas is the only other state with speed limits this high.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 233
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 233 - UT-54/Mona.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 228
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 288 - UT-28/North Main St.

item.title: UT-132 East At I-15 North
item.description: UT-132 east at I-15 north to Salt Lake City.

item.title: UT-132 East At I-15
item.description: UT-132 east at I-15 (Exit 225) in Nephi.

item.title: UT-132 East Approaching I-15
item.description: UT-132 east approaching I-15. Turn right for I-15 south to Las Vegas (Nevada); straight for I-15 north to Salt Lake, and UT-132 east to Manti.

item.title: UT-28 South at UT-132
item.description: UT-28 south at UT-132. Notice the different shields used for UT-28 and UT-132. The UT-28 style is the newer style.

item.title: UT-28 South Approaching UT-132
item.description: UT-28 south approaching UT-132. For I-15 north use UT-132 east. For I-15 south use UT-28 south.

item.title: UT-132 West at UT-28
item.description: UT-132 west at UT-28. Use UT-28 north for Santaquin. Use UT-28 south for Levan. Continue on UT-132 for Delta.

item.title: UT-131 West Approaching UT-28
item.description: UT-132 west approaching UT-28.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 225
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 225 - UT-132/100 North.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 222
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 222 - BL-15/UT-28/S. Main St.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 207
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 207 - Mills/Levan.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 202
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 202 - Yuba Lake. The red logo on the top of the sign is for Utah State Parks.
